sections.text: of release.A powerholder of a releasable power of appointment may release the power in whole or in part:(1) by substantial compliance with a method provided in the terms of the instrument creating the power; or(2) if the terms of the instrument creating the power do not provide a method or the method provided in the terms of the instrument is not expressly made exclusive, by a record manifesting the powerholder's intent by clear and convincing evidence.SourceLaws 2021, LB501, ยง 50.

30-4627.Method of release.

A powerholder of a releasable power of appointment may release the power in whole or in part:

(1) by substantial compliance with a method provided in the terms of the instrument creating the power; or

(2) if the terms of the instrument creating the power do not provide a method or the method provided in the terms of the instrument is not expressly made exclusive, by a record manifesting the powerholder's intent by clear and convincing evidence.

SourceLaws 2021, LB501, ยง 50.
